item.title: How set perfect ring in blurr base server
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

ownageunited:

item.java in config

Lol
item.java is about wearing items. where it goes and that stuff.
go to the map config, like he said. and open item.cfg
probably with right-click, open with “notepad”
replace your “item = 773” with this one:

item = 773 'perfect'_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 1469.99280576915 1469.99280576915 1760.58823743125 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999 99999
after that, run your server, login, do ::pickup 773 1, wield it and kill something/someone :

Read full topic

item.title: How set perfect ring in blurr base server
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

This is one of the most easy things you can ask, and one of the easyest to find on internet. if you are smart and would search for: “rsps adding bonusses” you would find it.
This is what i found in 10 seconds:

From: “G0dz Tank”

Its really easy to change the stats but becareful i tried to change stats to then i got this messed up error i cant fix :\

to change the stat bonuses go to items.cfg press ctrl + f and type in the code of your dclaws when u get their theirs a bunch of numbers next to it the 14th number is the str bonus so change the str bonus to w.e you want if u want u can mess around with the other numbers but NOT the 1st 3 that are like 120000 120000 1200000 dont change those >.>
WARNING MAKE A BACKUP FILE BEFORE DOING ANYTHING

Read full topic
